roleset.name: robe
roleset.note: CLAD-V NOTES: Automatically created based on framefiles: robe (41.3.3) (from clad.01-v predicate notes)

role.descr: person wearing clothes, when separate from agent

example.name: All arguments
example.text: And they clad her in lovely raiment, a wonder to see.

example.name: No agent
example.text: [They]-1 were clad *-1 in graceful, flowing robes, highly ornamented with metal and jewels.
example.arg: in graceful, flowing robes, highly ornamented with metal and jewels
